parameters:
Advanced Mage Relm, there is a discussion regarding your
treatment by the Archmage due to breaking the taboo of the
Magic Academy.
Advanced Mage: Um, Archmage. Are you okay?
Archmage: Huh!? Oh my, hahaha, I'm fine.
Archmage: So, what are we talking about?
Mage Relm: Archmage! It's not something significant!

Mage Relm: I just, you know, read a magic book that doesn't
match my rank a little!

Archmage: Well, is that all? This child is capable, so a
verbal warning should be enough, don't you think?

Mage Relm: That's right! As expected of the Archmage,
geniuses understand each other!

Mage Relm: When I finish creating this new grimoire, the
Magic Academy will forever be engraved in history!
Mage Relm: Ah, when I finish creating a new grimoire...

Archmage: I see... The magic book you read belongs to the
founder of the mages, Subma.

Mage Relm: I am aware that I have done something wrong, but
as a researcher, I will not hesitate to choose any means
necessary for my goals--

Archmage: The Academy is a place where talented individuals
gather, like a jewel sparkling with various talents, I have
witnessed.

Archmage: Among them, I have learned one lesson about talent
- that being capable doesn't necessarily mean you should do
everything.

Archmage: I have decided to take away a lot of your magical
knowledge as a way to atone for your sins this time.
Archmage: Reflect on what it means to break taboos.

Clea: I came from the Adventurer's Guild in Ftera. May I
tell you my story?
Mage Relm: Clea-san, what are you doing!?
Clea: I'm sorry, I just reflexively... Are you okay?

Archmage: Ugh... I-I'm fine. Thanks to you, I woke up... So,
who are you again?

Clea: I am Clea from the Adventurer's Guild. Today, I have a
request and came here to greet you.

Archmage: Hoho, the Adventurer's Guild, huh! No wonder you
have such a strong fist.

Clea: I would like to request the dispatch of a senior mage
from the Magic Academy for a request from the Adventurer's
Guild.

Archmage: Hmm, the dispatch of a senior mage? It's been a
while since the war with Tarasa.
Mage Relm: C-Can't we do something about this...?

Archmage: You should understand, right? What it means to be
in the position of a senior mage.

Priestess Sophia: Um, I think the client is someone very
important to the Magic Academy.
Archmage: Hmm... You have a good pair of breasts.

Priestess Sophia: Shall we continue the conversation?
Although I can't reveal my name, you are the person who
purchased the giant crystal, right?
Priestess Sophia: Can you understand this now?

Archmage: I see... You haven't given up on that foolish
dream from before, have you?

Archmage: If it's the senior mages in the region, there
should be no problem dispatching them.

Archmage: Please deliver this directive from me to the
senior mages located in various regions.

Archmage: Relm, you haven't given up on your dream yet, have
you?

Mage Relm: No, it's not like I care about grimoires or
anything!

Archmage: It's a good thing to have dreams that you don't
have to hide. Everyone has the right to dream.

Archmage: Many people do not know what lies beyond their
dreams. They continue to rush towards destruction without
the assurance that it is a paradise.

Archmage: Just because it's advice from an old man doesn't
mean it's necessarily something you should do.
Mage Relm: Oh, I'll remember that.
Archmage: Hmm... But she does have a nice butt.
Thief Nora: Kyaa! W-What are you doing!?

Mage Relm: Even Nora-san!? Please be more considerate, she
may seem ordinary but she's an amazing person!
Thief Nora: S-Sorry... It just happened.

Archmage: Hehe, youth is a wonderful thing... If you ever
find yourself in trouble, feel free to come and play...
Ugh...
Archmage: Hehe, is your journey going smoothly?
Archmage: Is this about something related to Mount Monimos?

Mage Relm: A-Archmage, as expected of you! Your hearing is
impressive!

Archmage: We have already received a request for
reinforcements from the Imperial Army, although it is
promised to be only for rear support.
Archmage: Did you all come as messengers from Agonia?

Clea: We would like your cooperation in fighting against the
dragons.

Clea: The dragons are at Mount Monimos. We want to use an
airship to lure them out to the ground.

Archmage: I don't fully understand, but... you're requesting
the dispatch of advanced mages, right?
Clea: May we make a request?

Archmage: Talent is an invaluable thing, so I don't want to
put advanced mages in danger.

Archmage: That's why I only approved the request from the
Imperial Army for rear support.
Clea: We will give you a part of the dragon's remains.

Mage Relm: Wait a minute, Clea-san!? Don't just decide on
your own... We also have a share!

Clea: Isn't it still valuable for the Academy, even if it's
just a part?

Clea: Please rest assured, all the expenses necessary to
operate the airship will be covered by Lord Luid, a
nobleman.

Archmage: We will cooperate with you, but I absolutely want
to ensure the safety of the advanced mages.

Archmage: Let's also dispatch Caron to the site. Previous
experience will surely be necessary.

Mage Relm: It seems like we've reached an agreement! Since
the Archmage is also busy, I'll take my leave. Goodbye!
Mage Relm: Ugh... What is it...?

Archmage: The grimoire used by the mage who sealed the demon
is different from the ordinary grimoires used by mages.

Archmage: If you succeed in subduing the dragon, you will
come significantly closer to realizing the dream of
completing the grimoire.

Mage Relm: I can't give up on my dream... There are people
who have been ridiculed just like me.

Mage Relm: Those people never gave up, and that's why they
were able to find the dragon!
Archmage: Even if that dream is a great mistake?
Mage Relm: It's not a mistake!

Archmage: ...Eventually, you will come to realize that your
dream is not desired by the world.

Archmage: I want you to keep the promise with the
Adventurer's Guild and also keep your own promises.
Thief Nora: Relm-san, are you okay?

Mage Relm: It's always like this! I will definitely make
them acknowledge me someday, I'm just one step away!

Priestess Sophia: Is this the end of the tasks related to
the airship?
Clea: Yes, let's go report to the guild leader.

Archmage: I want you to keep the promise with the
Adventurer's Guild and also keep your own promises.
Archmage: Oh ho, I suppose reinforcements have arrived?

Mage Relm: I won't give up! I'll keep coming until I get
permission, you know!

Archmage: No matter how many times you come, it's pointless.
I think I've understood enough in this past month.

Clea: I also want to help with Relm's dream, so please count
me in.
Thief Nora: A-Actually, please count me in too!
Priestess Sophia: Please count on me as well.

Mage Relm: I'm begging you once again! Archmage, please,
please!

Archmage: I have a condition to ask for in return for giving
you the dragon's remains. Is that acceptable?
Mage Relm: Yes! Anything is fine!

Archmage: Go to the site of judgment and handle the
troublesome problem there.
Mage Relm: Leave it to me! I'll go right away!
Clea: Thank you for granting permission.
Archmage: ...I wonder how long I'll be appreciated for.

Archmage: Now, all of you go and confirm the detailed
request on site.

Archmage: I want you to keep the promise with the
Adventurer's Guild and also keep your own promises.
Mage Relm: Archmage! I have fulfilled my promise!\^

Mage Relm: Now, it's the Archmage's turn! It's your turn to
keep the promise with me, right?\^

Mage Relm: Permission to study magic books! Restore my
sealed power!\^

Mage Relm: I'm ready! This genius is fully prepared to make
a name for myself at the academy!\^
Mage Relm: Archmage! Well then, please take care of me!\^
Archmage: Hmm... Shall I defeat that monster as well?

Archmage: Your skills are impressive, but as expected of the
Dragon Slayer party, I suppose.

Mage Relm: I appreciate your kind words, but you will keep
your promise with me, right?!

Archmage: Let's call the senior mages and return the stolen
magic knowledge, shall we?
Thief Nora: S-Somehow, I'm feeling excited!
Clea: Regaining your original power... That's amazing.

Priestess Sophia: Hehe, I wonder if my appearance will
change too?
Mage Relm: Yes, I'm ready anytime!

Archmage: Oh demons sealed within the grimoire by the
ancestor Subma, unleash your power according to my words
from the depths of the abyss, Akuri.

Archmage: Sealed demon, Ashirio! Return some of the
knowledge of mage Relm!

Mage Relm: Part...? Huh, wait a minute, Archmage, the
conversation--

\CL Learned the special move Restrained Control Technique
Limited Release.

Mage Relm: This is not what we agreed on! How could the
Archmage deceive us like this!

Archmage: Hehe, I don't recall making any specific promises,
you know?

Mage Relm: Grrr... C-Can I have permission to continue my
research!?

Archmage: Of course, it's not allowed. The act of creating a
grimoire is absolutely forbidden.

Mage Relm: I won't give up! I will definitely prove that
dreams can come true!

Archmage: I wonder if it was a good idea to release the
seal? It seems like she was deliberately lied to about some
parts.

Archmage: A reward is necessary for achievements, and
besides, I have reaffirmed it today.

Archmage: That girl will never stop. She is no longer just a
lonely mage in a small laboratory.
Advanced Mage: Archmage... Are you okay?

Archmage: You will encounter it on the journey of dreams...
just like I did... at the end of the dream...

Archmage: I want you to keep the promise with the
Adventurer's Guild and also keep your own promises.

Archmage: Thank you for coming. Let's skip the jokes and get
straight to the main topic, shall we?
Priestess Sophia: Oh my, is your usual attitude intentional?

Archmage: Setting that aside... You should be aware of the
incidents where mages are being attacked.

Mage Relm: Of course! We rescued Dokusa-san's friend, after
all.

Archmage: There have been an unusually high number of sudden
accidents and incidents, don't you think?

Archmage: I want you all to solve this problem. There have
already been missing persons from the Magic Academy.

Archmage: It has become a matter that concerns us directly,
and as the Magic Academy, we have no choice but to take
action.

Mage Relm: Leave it to me! I will solve this as the
representative of the Magic Academy!
Thief Nora: But... where is the enemy?

Priestess Sophia: If we don't know their whereabouts,
there's nothing we can do either.
Clea: Is there no way to do something about it?

Archmage: It's not completely nonexistent. There is a high
possibility that the culprits are seeking high-ranking
mages.

Archmage: For example, if a high-ranking mage were to
publicly announce their destination in advance, they might
be able to lure them out.

Thief Nora: I-Is that a decoy plan? That sounds really
dangerous... Is there no other way!?

Mage Relm: For mages and researchers, not being able to move
freely is a matter of life and death.

Mage Relm: I don't know the reason, but... I can't forgive
anyone who targets mages as a fellow mage!
Clea: Understood. Where should we head to?
Archmage: ...Head towards the Cage of Ishekel.

Archmage: There is a high possibility that incidents like
this are occurring in places outside the jurisdiction of the
Magic Academy.

Archmage: Let's spread a rumor that you guys are going to
the Cage of Ishekel.
Archmage: If we can overcome this as well, then...
3.イベント後のプレイヤーの位置

\CL Area Liberation\c[18]\CL Fotizona Region / Cage of
Ishekel\c[0]

Archmage: Let's spread the rumor that you guys are going to
Isheker's cage.

Archmage: I want you to keep the promise with the
Adventurer's Guild and also keep your own promises.

Archmage: Not only did you stop Kanonas, but you also saved
the empire. I am grateful.

Mage Relm: With a heavy heart, I gave up on the grimoire and
handed over all the materials to that bard.
Mage Relm: So, please return all of my magical knowledge!
Archmage: Oh, I have returned everything from last time.
Mage Relm: That shouldn't be possible--

Archmage: The knowledge within you has transformed, not for
your own power, but for the power of others.

Archmage: If we judge solely based on your abilities, you
are no different from an advanced mage.

Mage Relm: Because I am a genius, you know! Being an
advanced mage is just a stepping stone for me!

Mage Relm: My new dream is your seat, the next Archmage...
because I am this great genius!

Archmage: Hoho, that's good... Now all that's left is to
leave a mark at the academy.

Mage Relm: I can create achievements anytime, so I will
continue to act together with them until I am satisfied.
Mage Relm: Of course, you won't refuse, right?
Clea: Of course, please take care of me from now on as well.

Thief Nora: Yes! Let's return everything to everyone
together!

Priestess Sophia: My wish... I know it's an unreasonable
request, but I want your cooperation.
Mage Relm: You can leave it to this genius, no problem!

Mage Relm: Well then, as the Archmage, I have a journey with
my companions, so I'll take my leave. Goodbye.

Archmage: Take this with you for the arduous journey without
any objections.

Archmage: Did you forget something? By the way, you have
nice breasts.

Priestess Sophia: You knew that they were in the cage of
Ishekel, right?
Archmage: Hoho, what are you talking about?
Priestess Sophia: Which side are you on?

Archmage: We are on our own side, not neutral, but the Magic
Academy does not interfere.

Archmage: The way things are here, both now and in the
future, will absolutely not change. I won't let it change.

Priestess Sophia: Hehe, I understand. However, I don't
admire using others to achieve one's goals.

Priestess Sophia: Hoho, I must say I don't admire involving
friends to achieve one's goals.
Priestess Sophia: Thank you for your time, excuse me.

Archmage: It is desirable to have a conversation with a
beautiful woman, but... only if you don't have a hidden
dagger.
3.イベント後のプレイヤーの位置

If you want to become the successor, you should first aim to
become an advanced mage.

Archmage: I had a feeling it was about time. The Magic
Academy is neutral, it will never change.

Archmage: You didn't come here for serious negotiations, did
you?
Priestess Sophia: Oh my, have you seen through everything?

Archmage: It's a hypothetical situation... but even if a
civil war were to occur, we have no intention of interfering
at all.

Archmage: To be precise, we are not neutral, but rather we
have no intention of interfering. That is our exact
position.

Priestess Sophia: Oh my, riding on the winning horse, aren't
we? The Magic Academy is quite cunning, isn't it?

Priestess Sophia: By the way... there was a gentleman who
tried to achieve his goal without getting his hands dirty,
wasn't there?

Priestess Sophia: Hehe, I don't think the settlement is over
yet, you know?

Archmage: My acquaintance, the beautiful woman, stayed true
to her principles, huh...

Archmage: Speaking to myself... it seems that the palace
officials are visiting various ruins.

Archmage: I have heard that the palace has been conducting
investigations up to the locations designated for sealing by
the Academy's authority.

Archmage: The Tower of Betrayal... I'm not worried about it
anymore. Well then, let's consider this conversation over
and let me return to my research.

Mage Relm: I have been to the Tower of Betrayal before. It
seems to be a special place, and I was unable to enter.

Priestess Sophia: The people from Caron's side might be
aiming for something in that place.

Thief Nora: Archmage-san is such a nice person! To think
they would share such amazing information with us!

Priestess Sophia: Hehe, you're not someone who can be easily
dealt with, are you...

Priestess Sophia: Oh no, how about we head towards the Tower
of Betrayal?
Clea: Understood, I hope there will be a great harvest.
3.イベント後のプレイヤーの位置

\CL Area Liberation\c[18]\CL Kanonas Region / Tower of
Betrayal\c[0]

If you want to become the successor, you should first aim to
become an advanced mage.

parameters: Kanonas Guardsman: Please be respectful to the Archmage.
Kanonas Guard: Make sure you don't cause any trouble!
Kanonas Guardsman: Please be respectful to the Archmage.

Kanonas Guardsman: Please don't cause any more problems like
before. Thanks to you, I don't know how many incident
reports I've had to write.

events.name: アークメイジへの嘆願並列実行

parameters:
Archmage: Let's get straight to the point. The information
you all are seeking does not exist here.

Mage Relm: Does that include the advanced sorcerer's
exclusive library that I infiltrated in the past... for
investigation purposes?

Archmage: It was erased by the past Archmages who can assert
that it doesn't exist.

Mage Relm: If you think about it normally, that's true...
There's no reason to leave behind information about the
enemy we fear the most.
Archmage: If it exists... it would only be a sunken city.

Archmage: There is a high possibility that the Old Magic
Academy was conducting academic research on the abilities of
heroes.

Clea: Why are you telling us this information? I thought you
would oppose us getting involved.

Archmage: It would not be an exaggeration to say that my
life as a mage was spent together with that bard.

Archmage: After becoming an Archmage, I have always feared
him...

Archmage: It may sound strange, but I feel a sense of
camaraderie with those who have worked together for the
stability of the world.

Archmage: That is why... I wish for his humble wish to be
granted.

Clea: Thank you for the information. I would like to
investigate the sunken city.

Mage Relm: Leave it to this great genius! As the next
Archmage, I'll make sure to owe you a favor!
Archmage: Hoho, how reliable. Please grant his wish for me.
3.イベント後のプレイヤーの位置

\CL Area Liberation\c[18]\CL Kanonas Region / Sunken
City\c[0]
